headline: Gallagher strikes $1.2 billion deal for rival insurance broker Woodruff Sawyer
summary: The deal will bolster Gallagher's management liability, construction, real estate and cyber offerings and also expand its presence in the West Coast region.  Dealmaking activity within the insurance broker industry has ramped up in recent years, as companies look to beef up their presence in the middle-market segment.  Gallagher had also struck a $13.5 billion deal in December to buy insurance broker AssuredPartners.

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. Announces Agreement to Acquire Woodruff Sawyer
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. today announced it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire San Francisco, California-based Woodruff Sawyer. The transaction is subject to regulatory approval and is expected to close during the second quarter of 2025.

headline: Gallagher to buy insurance broker Woodruff Sawyer in $1.2 billion deal
summary: Insurance broker Arthur J. Gallagher said on Tuesday it would acquire rival Woodruff Sawyer in a $1.2 billion deal. ...

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher expands with Dyste Williams and RMA General acquisitions
summary: Dyste Williams will become part of Gallagher Agency Alliance, which falls under the leadership of Jen Tadin, head of Gallagher Select.
